text: Important: if you are 16y or up in the US, you are now eligible for #COVID19 #vaccine. I’ve seen tweets/emails from gov accts & other groups (eg @CovidActNow) this wk that say “Over 16? Get vaccinated now!” This isn’t the same & is confusing ppl: 16y olds can get Pfizer vax now. https://t.co/Z35DKXoi63
